attributes.name: Ancient Femur
attributes.description: Used in crafting to apply a bonus of Focus and Strength to an item.
attributes.parsed_description: Used in crafting to apply a bonus of Focus and Strength to an item.

attributes.name: Ancient Femur
attributes.description: The still-crackling femur of an Ancient being. Improve your Ancient Bane trophy with this.
attributes.parsed_description: The still-crackling femur of an Ancient being. Improve your Ancient Bane trophy with this.

attributes.name: Ancient Gold Talisman
attributes.description: Used in crafting to apply a bonus of Focus and Intelligence to an item.
attributes.parsed_description: Used in crafting to apply a bonus of Focus and Intelligence to an item.

attributes.name: Ancient Healer's Kit
attributes.description: A kit containing crumbling bandages and aged tinctures that the Ancients once used.
attributes.parsed_description: A kit containing crumbling bandages and aged tinctures that the Ancients once used.

attributes.name: Ancient Herbs
attributes.description: Sealed for hundreds of years, these herbs are florid and off-color from the rest of the herbs on the island.
attributes.parsed_description: Sealed for hundreds of years, these herbs are florid and off-color from the rest of the herbs on the island.

attributes.name: Ancient Inscribed Totem
attributes.description: Used in crafting to apply a bonus of Intelligence and Strength to an item.
attributes.parsed_description: Used in crafting to apply a bonus of Intelligence and Strength to an item.

attributes.name: Ancient Mandible
attributes.description: The still-chattering mandible of an Ancient being. Improve your Ancient Bane trophy with this.
attributes.parsed_description: The still-chattering mandible of an Ancient being. Improve your Ancient Bane trophy with this.

attributes.name: Ancient Metallic Thread
attributes.description: A metallic thread that Ancients adorn their soft armors with. When woven correctly it affords additional protection.
attributes.parsed_description: A metallic thread that Ancients adorn their soft armors with. When woven correctly it affords additional protection.
